t: Items that You Cannot Return - Amazon Customer Service
s: There are some items purchased on Amazon.com that you can't return. Among them are digital items, cards, and products that are unsafe for return. Devices are also non-returnable more than 30 days after delivery.

t: Is it common for Amazon to replace a broken item without asking you to return the original item? - Quora
s: Answer (1 of 10): I don't know if it is common, but I have had this happen. It was a gate to put at the top of out basement steps to prevent the grandkids from falling. It wouldn't line up properly and therefore couldn't be tightened across our hallway. A narrower doorway would have been ok. I...

t: Amazon is broken, and the good guys are losing - Lean Media
s: September 22, 2020 - The drumbeat of news concerning Amazon’s broken, corrupted system for third-party sellers continues. In the past I’ve talked about how innocent sellers can get snared by Amazon’s rules while sellers breaking them get off scot-free. Publishers are also affected.

t: Damaged or Defective Item - Amazon Customer Service
s: All our products go through intense quality check before they are shipped. However, in rare instances a product may get damaged during transit. Read below for Frequently Asked Questions about damaged or defective products.
